item.description:
Note 1 p.m. start time. 

Swap themes:

--Swap theme #1: Lines and Grids

--Swap theme #2: Washi tape (or similar tape techniques), based on May demo. 

--Special swap: Bring extra cards for swapping with Georgia Peaches.

This month's activity: The "Punchin' Luncheon" is back! We'll supply lots of paper punches that you can use throughout the day to build a stash of punched designs for future art projects. In addition, Betsi the Punchin' Queen will show us a few punching tips and tricks. 

If you've got paper punches or fancy paper that you're willing to share, bring them along. If not that's fine--there should be plenty to share.

See you Saturday!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the door near the back of the building, off the parking lot

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ June Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 6/23
